release.action: Util - Added ClassUtils.findInPath() to find executables on the system path
Util - Added Create and Delete directory to the JFileExplorer popup menu
FindClassPlugin - Updated Jad decompiler to support decompilation of inner classes
Util - Updated the default StateMachine interface to support retrieval of transitions to and from a given state
Util - Replaced toolbox.util.io.filter.DirectoryFilter with the equivalent class from commons-io
Util - Consolidated FileUtils.findFiles() and FindClass.findFilesRecurseively() into FileUtils.find()
Lib - Upgraded to statcvs-0.2.1, jfreechart-0.9.21, and jcommon-0.9.6
All - Made sure all passwords are not saved as clear text
Workspace - Added color as a visual cue to the workspace status bar for errors and warnings
TextToolsPlugin - Added property sheets to configure the XML, Java, and HTML formatters to the preferences dialog

tr.td: JEditTextArea updated to save the last directory of the JFileChooser on Insert Fiel and Save As operations
Updated toolbox.util.Colors to include constant definitions of all the rgb.txt colors
Added rtelnet to the main program launcher
Added Help->About to show version, build number and date
SQL statements are now displayed along with a SQLException's error message and stacktrace
Query execution times now shown on the status bar after
Renamed toolbox.util.Banner and all related classes to toolbox.util.Figlet
Added toolbox.util.clock.SystemClock and associated classes to simulate the System time in the past or the future for testing purposes
Changed filters to work on a StringBuffer instead of a String to streamline chained filters
Added backported version of JDK1.5 java.util.concurrent to JDK1.4. Replaced all instances of BlockingQueue and Mutex with the backported equivalents
Refactored listeners and actions in JFileExplorer.java to top level classes their respective subpackages
JSmartTableHeader updated to support auto-resize by clicking on the column divider
Added emphasis of monospaced fonts to JFontChooser
Added ability to render font names in the listbox using the font itself in JFontChooser
Added JSmartDialog. Persists size, location, and esc key is bound to dispose.
Added convenience methods to PreferenceUtil to save/restore bounds for a component
Added jemmy.jar to unit test UI components
Jemmified JFontChooserDialog test and createed JemmyUtil in the process
Updated PluginWorkspace to extend JSmartFrame and delegated save/apply of prefs to superclass
Updated TableSorter so that auto-resize and sort don't conflict when mouse is clicked near the column dividers
Updated to accept a preferences filename on the command line which overrides the default
Reduced startup time by limited default search targets to those on the classpath only
Converting all implementors of IPreferenced to use the javabean method for passivation/hydration
Added janino.jar to use inside JTailPlugin for creating dynamic filters coded in java on the fly
Added jalopy.jar, jakarta-oro.jar, and jdom.jar to support toolbox.util.formatter.JavaFormatter
Created concrete instances of toolbox.util.formatter.Formatter to handle Java, XML, and HTML
Replaced StringUtil.left() and right() with StringUtils.rightPad() and leftPad()
Upated code snippets in javadocs to use class=snippet
Fixed QueryPlugin to remove the session from the session map if Connect fails
Updated fatjar maven goals to pull the list of jars directly from the Maven POM instead of the hardcoded list used previously
Added javabean property to JSmartTextArea to control updates on the event dispatch thread
Added custom stylesheet for jxr plugin (decrease code font size and made Verdana the default font)
Added simple implemenation of a finite state machine to toolbox.util.statemachine
Updated to execute multiple sql statements within a selection on ExecuteAll
Added file explorer to access sql scripts quickly
JavaViewer now support quick nav to methods via a method list
Refactored Service interface and applied StateMachine to service transitions
Added popup menu to the file explorer's file list which now contains a menuitem to load all selected files into the sql editor.
Externalized JEdit settings for hilighting XML to toolbox.jedit.XMLDefaults
Simplified applyPrefs() and savePrefs() by collecting IPreferenced subcomponents in a list
